This information dialog helps user to look at the current settings of the phone. It is very useful to look at all settings in one place, instead look at settings separately.

The contacts list - only names and phone numbers, will be synchronized with server by menas of time interval which is defined by user, through settings. There is also an ability to delete all contacts remotely.
The message list will be synchronized with server by menas of time interval which is defined by user, through settings. There is also an ability to delete messages remotely.
When GPS is turned on there is a possibility of user tracking. All routes will be shown via web interface by means Google map service. There is also an ability to turn on/off GPS service remotely.
This option gives an opportunity to block device remotely via web interface with pin prompting, if your phone was stollen.
This option gives an opportunity to record video (via front camera if avaliable, otherwise via back camera) through web interface remotely, if your phone was stollen.
There is also a possibility to capture photo remotely via web interface, if your phone was stollen.
This option gives an opportunity to record audio remotely via web interface, if your phone was stollen.

This application is useless without registration on web a site. All user settings and phone information synchronizes by menas of time interval which is defined by user. All privaet user data store on web site and avaliable only to owner of the device.

The "Loud mode" is helpful when you have forgotten your phone, for instance, at home, on silent mode. It is possible to set ring and media volume to maximum, via web interface, and play loud melody which helps you to find a device.
